name: Don't let the lights go out!
name_original: Don't let the lights go out!
description:
This game was made for the post grind jam #3.

A small idea I had in mind when I saw the theme (light). I had so many cool Ideas I would've liked to add... but Im bad at programming, so... yeah (and I ran out of time to even design some more levels and features). Not a good game, not even sure if it is a game. well, still try to have fun... Spent most of my time on art (it's still pretty bad, tho). Please just leave any comment, any feedback is welcome.
